dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in 2023, President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev met with Mafalda Duarte from the Green Climate Fund.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in twenty twenty three, President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev met with Mafalda Duarte from the Green Climate Fund.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, the head of the GCF—that's the largest multilateral climate fund under the UNFCCC, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, the head of the G C F-that's the largest multilateral climate fund under the U N F C C C, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Green Climate Fund (GCF) is the largest multilateral climate fund, established under the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) to support developing countries in adapting to climate change and reducing greenhouse gas emissions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And they were talking about strengthening cooperation, especially around environmental protection and expanding forest resources in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And they were talking about strengthening cooperation, especially around environmental protection and expanding forest resources in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting, they discussed prospects for further strengthening cooperation between Kazakhstan and the Fund. The President of Kazakhstan emphasized that the country places particular importance on environmental protection, including the preservation and expansion of forest resources and the rational use of natural resources.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and I think he mentioned they're planning to host a Regional Climate Summit next year, which is a big deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and I think he mentioned they're planning to host a Regional Climate Summit next year, which is a big deal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan is planning to host a Regional Climate Summit next year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. The goal is collective solutions for climate adaptation, food security, water issues… you know, the major challenges.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. The goal is collective solutions for climate adaptation, food security, water issues... you know, the major challenges.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The main goal of the event is to seek collective solutions to major challenges, including climate change adaptation and ensuring food and water security.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And Mafalda Duarte seemed really supportive, especially of Kazakhstan's National Adaptation Plan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Mafalda Duarte seemed really supportive, especially of Kazakhstan's National Adaptation Plan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mafalda Duarte, in turn, expressed support for Kazakhstan's efforts to address climate issues. She especially praised the National Adaptation Plan, implemented with the support of the Fund and UNDP, which includes a comprehensive disaster risk management system and an early warning system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, the one developed with UNDP—it includes disaster risk management and early warning systems, which are so crucial.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, the one developed with U N D P-it includes disaster risk management and early warning systems, which are so crucial.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: She especially praised the National Adaptation Plan, implemented with the support of the Fund and UNDP, which includes a comprehensive disaster risk management system and an early warning system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And both sides emphasized fostering environmental awareness in society, like a respectful attitude toward nature.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And both sides emphasized fostering environmental awareness in society, like a respectful attitude toward nature.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Both sides also highlighted the importance of fostering a respectful attitude toward nature and developing environmental awareness in society.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting because Kazakhstan isn't always top of mind when we talk about climate leadership, but they're making some serious moves.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting because Kazakhstan isn't always top of mind when we talk about climate leadership, but they're making some serious moves.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and partnering with a fund that supports developing countries on emission reduction and adaptation—that's smart.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and partnering with a fund that supports developing countries on emission reduction and adaptation-that's smart.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Green Climate Fund (GCF) is the largest multilateral climate fund, established under the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) to support developing countries in adapting to climate change and reducing greenhouse gas emissions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. I wonder what concrete projects might come out of this meeting though.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. I wonder what concrete projects might come out of this meeting though.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Probably more focused on that National Adaptation Plan, maybe scaling up those early warning systems regionally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Probably more focused on that National Adaptation Plan, maybe scaling up those early warning systems regionally.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And with the summit coming up, it could really put Central Asia on the map for climate dialogue.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And with the summit coming up, it could really put Central Asia on the map for climate dialogue.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's good to see these partnerships forming—we need all hands on deck, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's good to see these partnerships forming-we need all hands on deck, honestly.
